about_the_game:
In Celestial Rune Consortium: Shadows of Ascension, you play as a Rune Agent whose task is to locate ancient runes in long-lost bunker facilities and extract them for the Consortium.

You will visit many remote and dangerous moons on your journey in service of the Consortium.

Missions are received in your office, where you can freely choose your next target based on your abilities. In your office, you can also invest your earned skillpoints to improve your character traits and your credits to buy additional ammo support modules, enabling you to better counter enemies in future missions, increase your chances of survival, and consequently boost your profits.

But beware! You are not alone, various creatures are hostile towards you and will attempt to interfere with your mission. This begins with anomalies on different moons that can negatively affect your character's attributes, induce hallucinations, or harm your health. Use your abilities and resources wisely you can try the "smash and grab" approach or opt for a stealthier approach, stealing the runes quietly in the shadows. Perhaps you'll be lucky and remain undiscovered.

Unknown plants and their toxins can influence you in either positive, stimulating ways, or negative ones, be warned.

Scary lifeforms roam the dark bunker facilities and defend the runes at all costs. Beware of swift and agile hunters, lumbering brutes, or insects that harass you from a distance. Some have the ability of teleportation and can make your life hell in an unguarded moment.

Defy the countless dangers, collect the runes, fulfill the Consortium's objectives, and go down in history as the best Rune Agent in the Consortium's annals.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, all scenes primarily consist of regular battles, typically with robots and monsters. However, at various intervals, "jump scares" caused by anomalies occur. These may include ghosts running towards the player while screaming, sound files playing intermittently to startle the player, and spider creatures crawling out of holes and advancing towards the player as well as teleporting creatures.

  • OS: Win 10 32bit

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: You can achieve the goals set by the Consortium in several ways, whether you prefer to take a more aggressive approach or opt for stealth. Improve your character traits through skills that you can learn, and additional equipment. But be warned, others may seek to contest your extraction efforts.
